parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Makes sure that a sound can start playing without any delay once it is needed. Command works in Arma 3, but might not be implemented in earlier Arma installments.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''preloadSound''' soundName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> soundName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>{
	[[waitUntil]] {[[preloadSound]] _x};
} [[forEach]] [[getArray]] ([[missionConfigFile]] >> "CfgSounds" >> "sounds");</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[preloadTitleRsc]]
</value></part></template>
